body:
I think the problem is `go get /`, if the go tool is accepting that, it
probably shouldn't.

On Fri, 5 Feb 2016, 03:06 Brad Fitzpatrick <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Your GOPATH seems fine. There's nothing special about /home/user/project/
> or /tmp/. I think we're going to need more details to reproduce this. Which
> directory are you in? What errors do you get? Which package(s) do you start
> with?
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/14224#issuecomment-179919662>.
>
